Comments.ConnectionStrings_AgentTaskDatabase: PostgreSQL connection string. If empty, uses in-memory storage. Example: Host=localhost;Database=opencopilot;Username=postgres;Password=yourpassword
Comments.LLM_Planner: Used during planning phase - ideally more powerful models like gpt-4o
Comments.LLM_Executor: Used during execution phase - ideally cheaper models like gpt-4o-mini or gpt-3.5-turbo
Comments.LLM_Thinker: Used in Research Agent - powerful and general models like gpt-4o
Comments.BackgroundJobs_MaxConcurrency: Maximum number of jobs to process concurrently
Comments.BackgroundJobs_MaxQueueSize: Maximum number of jobs in the queue (0 for unlimited)
Comments.BackgroundJobs_EnablePrioritization: Whether to process higher priority jobs first
Comments.BackgroundJobs_ShutdownTimeoutSeconds: How long to wait for jobs to complete during shutdown
Comments.BackgroundJobs_PlanTimeoutSeconds: Timeout for plan generation phase in seconds (0 for no timeout)
Comments.BackgroundJobs_ExecutionTimeoutSeconds: Timeout for plan execution phase in seconds (0 for no timeout)
